creator: fabio.heer@dvbern.ch
text:
Created attachment 34505
Patch for WorkdayCalculator

The excel function NETWORKDAYS can be used with two equal input dates, e.g. 2017-01-01, 2017-01-01. In this case, the underlying WorkdayCalculator returns erroneously the value 2 instead of 0.

This behavior is not conform with the calculations in MS Office and LibreOffice.

Tests and a fix is provided in the attachment.

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: Applied via r1776588, thanks for the Patch!
